mapper.select: SELECT T1.ROWNUMBER, T1.MAIN_CLASS_CD, T1.CMN_CD_TP, T1.MAIN_CLASS_NM, T1.SEQ, T1.DESCR, T1.USE_YN, T1.REG_ID, T1.REG_DT, T1.MOD_ID, T1.MOD_DT FROM ( SELECT @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 AS ROWNUMBER, T.* FROM CMN_M_CD T, ( SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) TEMP ORDER BY T.SEQ ASC )T1 ORDER BY T1.ROWNUMBER DESC

SELECT T1.ROWNUMBER, T1.MAIN_CLASS_CD, T1.MDL_CLASS_CD, T1.MDL_CLASS_NM, T1.DESRC, T1.RELAT_CD_1, T1.RELAT_CD_2, T1.RELAT_CD_3, T1.USE_YN, T1.REG_ID, T1.REG_DT, T1.MOD_ID, T1.MOD_DT FROM ( SELECT @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 AS ROWNUMBER, T.* FROM CMN_M_CD_DTL T, ( SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) TEMP WHERE MAIN_CLASS_CD = #{mainClassCd} )T1 ORDER BY T1.ROWNUMBER DESC
